dialog.text: there are two mountains and one river separates them. the main mountain takes up most of the space of the whole image. the other mountain is behind it and has snow at the peak
are the mountains in the background or foreground? What is the weather like?
the major one is in the foreground. the other one is in the background. It is a sunny day with clear blue sky.
What is the ground composed of? How much of the screen would you say the main mountain takes up?

there one big major mountain in the foreground is covered with trees and takes up three fifths . the shape of the mountain is a big triangle in the middle. The other mountain are as a background behind that.
Are there any important details about the small mountain? do the two mountains touch but are separated by the river?
the small mountain has some snow at the peak. The river separates them, but the rivers is only a very small triangle shapes on the left middle part of the image
What percentage of the screen is the river? Does the river flow or does it just separate the mountains?
i will say smaller than the size of a penny. it just separates them.
Is the mountain a ridge line? Or just two distinct entities?
the river is one the left most, near the edge of the image. And the size is half of a penny. The mountains are two distinct entities
can you see the sun in the image?
no, there is no sun. Just a blue clear sky
